grails-app.taglib
Class AuthTagLib

java.lang.Object
  grails-app.taglib.AuthTagLib

class AuthTagLib

A taglib to help with J2EE security implementations (e.g. Acegi) within Grails.

author:
Joe Mooney
since:
23-November-2006

Property Summary
private def getUserName

def ifLoggedIn

Execute main body only if the user is logged in
def ifNotLoggedIn

Execute main body only if the user is logged in
def ifUserCanEdit

Execute main body only if the user is logged in and is either an admin user (based on supplied roles) or if they were the creator of the bean (based on the supplied userName)
def ifUserHasNoRole

Execute main body only if the user is logged in and has none of the roles requested
def ifUserHasRole

Execute main body only if the user is logged in and has one of the roles requested
def loggedInUser

Output the signed on user name (if they are logged in)
def userHasOneOfRequiredRoles
